title: All new Cervelo Aspero-5 Gravel bike gets lighter, faster & more aerodynamic
content:
Fast is never enough for a company like Cervelo, faster is always better. How do you make a fast gravel bike faster? You make it more aero, reduce some weight and maintain the stiffness. That was goal with Cervelo’s newest addition to the gravel race world with the Aspero-5.  New Fork Cervelo introduced the Caledonia-5 […]

The post All new Cervelo Aspero-5 Gravel bike gets lighter, faster & more aerodynamic appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Joe Mackey
